validate
if validation passed, do all of the following: 
	save to class
		contact c = new contact();
		c."each info" = "source of info"

		if c.buisiness
		lstBuisness

		else
		Personal
	call the file save method
		stream writer to targeted location, utilizing CSV (or something conceptually like that)

clear UI input
	clear data input:
	txt"source" clear
	checkbox uncheck
